content.rendered:
[vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”center center” css=”.vc_custom_1601387795505{padding-top: 200px !important;padding-bottom: 300px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Become-A-Partner-M.jpg?id=11156) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_init_translate_x=”1″ ca_init_translate_y=”-53″ ca_delay=”300″ row_hide=”hidden-xs” responsive_css=”padding_top_large:200px|padding_bottom_large:300px|padding_top_medium:150px|padding_bottom_medium:150px|padding_top_small:150px|padding_bottom_small:150px”][vc_column width=”1/2″]

Partnering with

Falanx Cyber

Grow your sales pipeline and keep your clients cyber-safe

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ align=”text-center”] Get in touch [vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”right top” css=”.vc_custom_1600872056939{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 90px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Become-a-Partner-1.jpg?id=11157) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_init_translate_x=”1″ ca_init_translate_y=”-53″ ca_delay=”300″ row_hide=”hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1601028359878{padding-right: 80px !important;}”]

Partnering with

Falanx Cyber

Grow your sales pipeline and keep your clients cyber-safe

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ align=”text-center”] Get in touch [vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”0″ bg_position=”right top” css=”.vc_custom_1594827287886{background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/yellow-middle-section.jpg?id=8868) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” row_hide=”hidden-xs hidden-sm hidden-md”][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” animation_preset=”Fade In Left” css=”.vc_custom_1596795859198{margin-top: -230px !important;padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}” ca_delay=”260″ ca_duration=”3000″]

Enabling Business Growth with Falanx Cyber

[vc_column_text]

Irrespective of whether you’re a leading solution provider, system integrator, MSSP or corporate reseller, by partnering with Falanx Cyber you access a portfolio of cyber security services that will secure your clients and grow your business.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Increase Revenue

Generate new opportunities to rapidly grow your business and increase profitability.

Remain Competitive

Become your clients’ trusted advisor and retain your long-term client relationships with effective cyber security solutions.

Differentiate Yourself

Our mantra is to provide enterprise-class cyber solutions to all, big and small. As such, we offer a range of services on a variety of platforms to suit all organisations and budgets.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″]

Work alongside a trusted partner

Collaborating with us means you get the benefit of our reputation in the industry as well as our range of cyber security solutions.

Win new business

We’re not just focussed on great cyber security services – we’re also committed to developing a flexible, adaptable and predictable pipeline with you.

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_column_text]

Interested in becoming a partner?

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Fill out the form for more information about becoming a partner

[/vc_column_text]

    [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” bg_position=”center top”][vc_column][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1651671660632{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;padding-left: 60px !important;background-color: #122135 !important;}”][vc_column enable_overlay=”yes” align=”text-center” el_class=”o2c-white-text”][vc_column_text el_class=”o2c-white-text”]

    Are you an N-able MSP partner? Find out more about our N-able Partner Programme

    [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

    "I need a trusted partner that can provide additional security services into my portfolio."

    Managing Director

    Enhance your portfolio with our suite of cybersecurity services Find out more

    “As a security manager I know the benefit of carrying out simulated cyber attacks on our systems. I need a service provider that can handle my requirements.”

    Security Manager

    Uncover critical vulnerabilities in your environment Find out more

    “I need a supplier that understands the importance of implementing and maintaining Information Security best practices critical to our ongoing success and reputation.”

    Managing Director

    Get real-time ongoing cyber detection & response Find out more

    “My job is to ensure that our business is protected against cyber security attacks. I need a company that can hunt for and eradicate threats.”

    CISO

    24/7 ongoing monitoring to hunt for and eradicate threats Find out more

    “I need a company that can deliver cutting-edge training to my staff, ensuring they are empowered to recognise and defend against cyber security threats.”

    Head of Training

    Training and advisory services to empower your staff Find out more     [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row parallax=”enable_parallax” enable_content_animation=”yes” animation_preset=”Fade In Right” enable_overlay=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1601387813596{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 140px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Testimonials-V2.jpg?id=12953) !important;background-position: center;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ el_id=”testimonials-MDR” row_hide=”hidden-xs”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-4″]

    Testimonials

    [/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-offset-3 vc_col-md-9″]

    “I have been very impressed by the high standard of Falanx’s communication, testing procedures and reporting. From the initial engagement through to test reports and follow up advice, they have provided exceptional service and I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend them; we will certainly be using them again for future testing.”

    Claudia Zimmer
    Operations Manager, Ensign Pensions

    “The team at Falanx have been great, from an initial enquiry to completing the test has been seamless. Our account manager and the rest of the team have been incredibly reactive in responding to our queries and the work performed has been great. I would not hesitate to recommend Falanx for your IT Security needs.”

    Mitchell Smith
    Product Manager, One Site Global Ltd

    “We have worked with Falanx Cyber for several years and have always been impressed with the professional service they provide. This begins with the early stages of planning, providing useful advice on which areas to focus testing on, including any specific details around emerging threats. This continues with the execution of the agreed pen tests and vulnerability assessments where we are kept informed throughout the whole process, and finally with the informative reports produced and any assistance required following any remediation efforts.”

    James Myhill
    Head of IT, Canal and River Trust

    “Falanx provided us with a phishing campaign that delivered a invaluable insight into how our staff reacted to potentially dangerous phishing attempts. The Phishing results were very  enlightening and will help shape our internal cyber security awareness program. We were very pleased with the design and execution of the campaign and we will continue to use Falanx for further phishing campaigns to prove the effectiveness of our cyber security training”

    Tony Donn
    Head of IT, Cenkos

    “Falanx conducted in-person training session that made employees engage, participate, and ask questions. Rob the trainer showed us that human recognition is one of the most important lines of defence against phishing and cyber security attacks. We especially enjoyed Rob’s stories of social engineering and made all employees sit up and think how important all aspects of cyber security not just attacks via conventional means.”

    Tony Donn
    Head of IT, Cenkos

    “We see great value in investing in positive reinforcement of staff, especially in delivering awareness training. Due to COVID-19 on site training was not possible but Falanx were able to step in and provide their usual high quality cyber security training over web.”

    Cyber Security Manager
    Leading Specialist Bank
    [/vc_column][/vc_row]
